title: dAsu bArisutide
sahitya:
dAsu bArisutide kELi dAsarella


anupallavi

  shrIshana bhajaneya mADada manujava AyuSyavu vyartta hOyitu endu


caraNam 1    hAsumanca suppattigeyalli hagalu iruLu hesara katteyante horaLi strIyara kUDi bEsara 
paDede nitya uruLi I pariyandali manuSya AyuSya vrudA vrudA hOyitu hOyitu endu
    caraNam 2    bAlya yauvana vrddhakAla vivEkavillade hALgi hOyitu vyartta kAla AhAradindu 
bALA nidreyinda atilOla I pariyindali kAlana maneyu samIpavAyitu Ayitu endu
    caraNam 3    kaNDa kaNDa viSayava kAmisi kaSTavu paDade tANDava shrI krSNana bhajisi puNDanenisade 
baNTadhAvatiyanu tyajisi puNDarIkAkSana purandara viTTalana bhajisibadukendu DhaN DhaN DhaNA endu
